mapper.select: SELECT board_num, title, contents, user_id, file, cotegory, cnt, created FROM USER_BOARD ORDER BY board_num DESC LIMIT #{queryFirstStart}, #{displayContentNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_BOARD (title, contents, user_id, file, cotegory) VALUES (#{title},#{contents},#{user_id},#{file},#{cotegory})
mapper.select: SELECT board_num, title, contents, user_id, file, cotegory FROM USER_BOARD WHERE board_num = #{board_num}
